thread.title: ‘Orange Is The New Black’ star Danielle Brooks just pulled off three controversial fashion trends all at once
thread.title_full: ‘Orange Is The New Black’ star Danielle Brooks just pulled off three controversial fashion trends all at once

author: Ashley Rey
title: ‘Orange Is The New Black’ star Danielle Brooks just pulled off three controversial fashion trends all at once
text:
‘Orange Is The New Black’ star Danielle Brooks just pulled off three controversial fashion trends all at once Actress, model and singer Danielle Brooks was recognized amongst Harper’s BAZAAR 150 Most Fashionable Women, and it was so well-deserved. And to prove she more than earned her spot, Broadway glamazon rocked the hell out of three trends we wouldn’t normally see paired together, perfectly.
Danielle gave us some major sheer, hoop skirt and off the shoulder jacket action in one outfit. And it all worked together, seamlessly! Who knew the pairing of the hottest trends in 2016 would start a new one in 2017?
Danielle Brooks rocked the three trends like we’ve never seen before. She looks amazing. Rachel Murray/Getty Images To say that we’re “obsessed” with her attire would be an understatement. She’s fierce! Patrick McMullan/Getty Images Bold, sophisticated and sexy. And, we’re totally loving every bit of it!
Danielle delivers #stylegoals effortlessly. We could learn thing or two from the style queen. She always exudes of so much confidence in whatever she rocks, and that’s so important.

And, we’re totally calling dibs on the velvet hoop skirt! It’s definitely something we’d like to see carried over into 2017’s fashion trends.
She’s at the top of her game, and we’re here for it. We’re waiting with bated breath to see what brilliance she comes up with next!
